title: Chapter Metadata Schema
description: Validation schema for chapter frontmatter in Docusaurus Markdown files

title.description: Chapter title displayed in navigation and page header
examples: Week 3: ROS 2 Architecture and Core Concepts

description.description: Brief summary for SEO and page metadata (150-160 characters recommended)
examples: Introduction to ROS 2 nodes, topics, services, and the computation graph architecture

sidebar_position.description: Order in the sidebar (within parent category)

sidebar_label.description: Optional custom label for sidebar (if different from title)

estimated_time.description: Estimated reading/completion time in hours (fractional allowed)

module.description: Module number (1-4) or null for intro/capstone chapters

prerequisites.description: Array of prerequisite chapter paths (relative to docs/)

learning_objectives.description: Measurable learning outcomes for this chapter (use action verbs from Bloom's taxonomy)
examples: Explain the ROS 2 computation graph and node lifecycle
Create a simple ROS 2 node using rclpy
Launch multiple nodes and inspect the graph using CLI tools

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment associated with this chapter

capstone_component.description: Capstone project component this chapter contributes to

examples.title: Week 3: ROS 2 Architecture and Core Concepts
examples.description: Introduction to ROS 2 nodes, topics, services, and the computation graph architecture with hands-on examples using rclpy.

Create a simple ROS 2 node using rclpy
